verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* Booz \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* seen \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H3427"\w*, \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* before, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w*, calling \w him|strong="H0559"\w* \w by|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w name|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* little \w while|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*. \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* Booz \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*: \w Sit|strong="H3427"\w* ye \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* sat down, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H0251"\w*: Noemi, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* parcel \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w our|strong="H0834"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H1350"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w take|strong="H3045"\w* possession \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w by|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* right \w of|strong="H3427"\w* kindred: \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* possess \w it|strong="H0518"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w please|strong="H0595"\w* thee \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w near|strong="H5048"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w besides|strong="H2108"\w* thee, \w who|strong="H0369"\w* art first, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w who|strong="H0369"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* second. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* field.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* Booz \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w When|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, thou \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H6965"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, \w who|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w deceased|strong="H4191"\w*: \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy kinsman \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* yield \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H1353"\w* \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w next|strong="H1350"\w* akin: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cut \w off|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* posterity \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* own family. \w Do|strong="H3201"\w* thou \w make|strong="H3588"\w* use \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* privilege, which \w I|strong="H3588"\w* profess \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3201"\w* willingly forego.

\w Now|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w former|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w manner|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w between|strong="H5921"\w* kinsmen, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w if|strong="H0376"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w yielded|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H1353"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* sure, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighhour; \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w testimony|strong="H8584"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* cession \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w right|strong="H1353"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1350"\w* Booz \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H8025"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*: Put off thy \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w*. \w And|strong="H0559"\w* immediately \w he|strong="H0559"\w* took \w it|strong="H1350"\w* off from \w his|strong="H8025"\w* foot.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* Elimelech’s, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Chelion’s, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Mahalon’s, \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Noemi:

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w taken|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Mahalon, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w deceased|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* lest \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w family|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*. \w You|strong="H0859"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* say, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* thing.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* cometh \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Lia, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* example \w of|strong="H1004"\w* virtue \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Ephrata, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w famous|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Phares, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* Thamar \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* unto Juda, \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w woman|strong="H5291"\w*.

Booz \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2032"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Noemi: \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* suffered thy family \w to|strong="H0413"\w* want \w a|strong="H7121"\w* successor, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* preserved \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shouldst \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* comfort thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* cherish thy \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy daughter \w in|strong="H5315"\w* law: \w who|strong="H0834"\w* loveth thee: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou hadst \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* Noemi \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0539"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* she \w carried|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w nurse|strong="H0539"\w* unto \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w women|strong="H7934"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* neighbours, congratulating \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: There \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Noemi: \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isai, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.
\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* Phares: Phares \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* Esron,
Esron \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* Aram, Aram \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* Aminadab,
Aminadab \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* Nahasson, Nahasson \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* \w Salmon|strong="H8009"\w*,
\w Salmon|strong="H8012"\w* \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* Booz, Booz \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*,
\w Obed|strong="H5744"\w* \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* Isai, Isai \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.
